Class Clusters

    BulkResources<ClusterRestRep>, Resources<ClusterRestRep>, TenantResources<ClusterRestRep>

    public class Clusters
extends AbstractCoreBulkResources<ClusterRestRep>
implements TenantResources<ClusterRestRep>
    Cluster resources.

    Base URL: /compute/clusters

      • create

        public ClusterRestRep create(java.net.URI tenantId,
                             ClusterCreateParam input)
        Creates a cluster for the given tenant.

        API Call: POST /tenants/{tenantId}/clusters

        Parameters:
        tenantId - the ID of the tenant.
        input - the create configuration.
        Returns:
        the newly created cluster.

      • update

        public ClusterRestRep update(java.net.URI id,
                             ClusterUpdateParam input)
        Updates a cluster by ID.

        API Call: PUT /compute/clusters/{id}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the cluster to update.
        input - the update configuration.
        Returns:
        the updated cluster.

      • update

        public ClusterRestRep update(java.net.URI id,
                             ClusterUpdateParam input,
                             boolean updateExports)
        Updates a cluster by ID.

        API Call: PUT /compute/clusters/{id}?update-exports={updateExports}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the cluster to update.
        input - the update configuration.
        updateExports - if true, will also update cluster exports.

      • deactivate

        public Task<ClusterRestRep> deactivate(java.net.URI id)
        Deactivates a cluster by ID if cluster hosts do not have block or file exports.

        API Call: POST /compute/clusters/{id}/deactivate

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the cluster to deactivate. The cluster hosts must not have block or file exports

      • deactivate

        public Task<ClusterRestRep> deactivate(java.net.URI id,
                                       boolean detachStorage)
        Deactivates a cluster.

        API Call: POST /compute/clusters/{id}/deactivate?detach-storage={detachStorage}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the cluster to deactivate.
        detachStorage - if true, will first detach storage.

      • detachStorage

        public Task<ClusterRestRep> detachStorage(java.net.URI id)
        Detaches storage from a cluster.

        API Call: POST /compute/clusters/{id}/detach-storage

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the cluster.

      • searchByName

        public java.util.List<ClusterRestRep> searchByName(java.lang.String clusterName)
        Lists the clusters for the given name.

        API Call: GET /compute/clusters/search?name={name}

        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name of the cluster.
        Returns:
        the list of cluster references.
